back_cards.example_en: The job requires strong communication skills.
The recipe requires fresh ingredients.
The law requires drivers to wear seatbelts.

back_cards.definition_en: To call for as a condition
back_cards.example_en: The project requires a large budget.
The teacher requires homework to be submitted on time.

back_cards.definition_en: A series of movements to music
back_cards.example_en: The dance at the wedding was lively.
She attended a dance at the community center.
Ballet is her favorite type of dance.
The dance on stage captivated the audience.
Their teamwork was like a well-rehearsed dance.

back_cards.definition_en: A piece of clothing for the upper body
back_cards.example_en: He wore a clean shirt to the interview.
The blue shirt matched his jeans.
The team’s shirt had their logo on it.
She bought a flannel shirt for camping.

back_cards.definition_en: A symbol of work or role
back_cards.example_en: He’s a white-shirt professional at the office.

back_cards.definition_en: A small amount of money given for service
back_cards.example_en: She left a generous tip for the waiter.

back_cards.definition_en: The end or point of something
back_cards.example_en: The tip of the pencil broke during the test.
He shared a tip for better gardening.
The detective followed a tip about the case.

back_cards.definition_en: A part of a tool or object
back_cards.example_en: The knife’s tip was sharp and precise.

back_cards.definition_en: A synthetic material that can be molded
back_cards.example_en: The bottle was made of plastic.
She recycled all the plastic in her home.
The toy was crafted from durable plastic.
His smile seemed plastic and insincere.
She paid with plastic instead of cash.

back_cards.definition_en: Relating to India or its people
back_cards.example_en: She enjoyed Indian cuisine at the restaurant.
The festival featured Indian music and dance.
The museum displayed Indian artifacts.
He wore an Indian silk scarf.
The Indian wedding was vibrant and colorful.
The scratch left a mark on the table.
The map had a mark for the treasure.
She received a high mark on her essay.
The campaign hit its fundraising mark.
His honesty was a mark of his character.

back_cards.definition_en: A hard structure in the mouth
back_cards.example_en: She brushed her tooth after breakfast.

back_cards.definition_en: A part of a tool or machine
back_cards.example_en: The saw’s tooth was sharp and effective.
The comb’s tooth was broken.
He has a sweet tooth for chocolate.

back_cards.definition_en: A symbol of strength or fight
back_cards.example_en: They fought tooth and nail to win.
The recipe called for lean meat.
The meat of the coconut was delicious.
The meat of the argument was clear.
Grilled meat was served at the barbecue.
She avoided meat for health reasons.
Work stress kept her awake at night.
The bridge was tested for stress.
The teacher put stress on punctuality.
She managed her stress with meditation.
The material broke under stress.
Parking here is illegal after 6 p.m.
The move was illegal in the game.
Illegal fishing harmed the ecosystem.
The police stopped the illegal activity.
The company faced fines for illegal practices.

back_cards.definition_en: In a way that is important or noticeable
back_cards.example_en: Sales increased significantly this year.

back_cards.definition_en: To a great extent or degree
back_cards.example_en: Her health improved significantly after treatment.
The policy significantly affected the economy.
The results differed significantly from predictions.
The new design is significantly better.

back_cards.definition_en: The second month of the year
back_cards.example_en: Her birthday is in February.

back_cards.definition_en: A time of winter in the Northern Hemisphere
back_cards.example_en: February brought heavy snow to the city.
February is the shortest month.
The festival is held every February.
By February, spring was approaching.
The country’s constitution guarantees free speech.
The constitution of the committee was diverse.
The club drafted a new constitution.
His strong constitution helped him recover.
The constitution of the molecule was studied.

back_cards.definition_en: A statement of a word’s meaning
back_cards.example_en: The dictionary provided a clear definition.
Her definition of success was unique.
The photo lacked definition in low light.
The definition of the project was vague.
He asked for a definition of the term.
Her uncle taught her how to fish.

back_cards.definition_en: A term for a close family friend
back_cards.example_en: Uncle Joe isn’t really related to us.

back_cards.definition_en: A male relative of an older generation
back_cards.example_en: The uncle shared stories at the reunion.

back_cards.definition_en: A figure of guidance or support
back_cards.example_en: Her uncle was like a second father.

back_cards.definition_en: A respectful address for an elder
back_cards.example_en: She called the neighbor uncle out of respect.

back_cards.definition_en: A hard, shiny material like iron
back_cards.example_en: The gate was made of strong metal.
The factory recycled scrap metal.
He loves listening to heavy metal.
The artist shaped the metal into a sculpture.
Her resolve was as tough as metal.
The band released a new album.
She showed me her wedding album.
The artist’s album featured sketches.
The family album was full of old pictures.
The stamp album was carefully organized.
She focused on improving her self.
He stayed true to his self despite pressure.
Meditation helped her connect with her self.
Her self was reflected in her art.
The book explored the idea of the self.
I suppose you’re right about the plan.
Suppose we take a different route?
The rules suppose everyone participates.
She supposed he was at the meeting.
Let’s suppose the experiment fails.
The investor funded the startup.
The investor diversified her portfolio.
He was an early investor in the company.
The investor analyzed stock trends.
Investors helped the business expand.
She ate a piece of fruit for breakfast.
Their hard work bore fruit in success.
The market sold fresh tropical fruit.
The fruit of the tree was ripe.
The fruit of her efforts was a promotion.
The holy site attracted pilgrims.
The holy book guided their faith.
She lived a holy life of service.
The holy day was observed quietly.
The holy atmosphere calmed her mind.

back_cards.definition_en: A piece of furniture for work
back_cards.example_en: Her desk was covered with papers.
He sat at the reception desk.

back_cards.definition_en: A surface for writing or reading
back_cards.example_en: The student kept a lamp on his desk.
The news desk reported the story.
She organized her desk for efficiency.
The eastern sky glowed at sunrise.
She studied Eastern philosophy.
The eastern region had heavy rain.
The festival featured Eastern music.
The eastern border was closely monitored.
The valley was lush with greenery.

back_cards.definition_en: A region shaped by a river
back_cards.example_en: The valley attracted many settlers.
The valley was home to vineyards.
She walked through a valley of challenges.
The valley offered stunning views.
The project was largely successful.
Her decision was largely influenced by data.
The audience was largely students.
The issue was largely ignored.
The city’s growth was largely due to tourism.
The clinic provided information on abortion.
She discussed abortion with her doctor.
The debate on abortion was heated.

back_cards.definition_en: The act of ending something prematurely
back_cards.example_en: The project’s abortion disappointed the team.
Laws on abortion vary by country.
She read a chapter before bed.
Moving was a new chapter in her life.

back_cards.definition_en: A local branch of an organization
back_cards.example_en: He joined the chapter of the charity.
The novel’s final chapter was thrilling.
The war marked a dark chapter.
Her commitment to the cause was inspiring.
His commitment to training paid off.
The couple renewed their commitment.
The team showed commitment to quality.
The contract was a serious commitment.

back_cards.definition_en: To honor or observe an event
back_cards.example_en: They celebrated their anniversary with dinner.
The town celebrated the festival with fireworks.
She celebrated her promotion with friends.
The school celebrated its top students.
They celebrated the holiday with prayers.

back_cards.definition_en: The act of detaining by police
back_cards.example_en: The arrest was made after a chase.
The medicine caused a cardiac arrest.
Her speech was an arrest of the crowd’s focus.
The arrest followed a thorough investigation.
The suspect’s arrest calmed the community.
The restaurant served prime steak.
Her prime concern was safety.

back_cards.definition_en: At the peak or best stage
back_cards.example_en: He’s in the prime of his career.
The prime candidate won the election.
The land was prime for farming.
Urban life is fast-paced and vibrant.
The urban area had tall buildings.
Urban development improved the neighborhood.
She enjoyed urban music and art.
The urban park was a popular spot.
The company faced internal challenges.
The doctor checked for internal injuries.
The internal memo was confidential.
She had an internal debate about the decision.
The machine’s internal parts were complex.
The noise didn’t bother her while she worked.

back_cards.definition_en: To take the trouble to do something
back_cards.example_en: He didn’t bother to call ahead.
Sorry to bother you, but I need help.
The news bothered him all day.
Don’t bother the dog while it’s eating.
Her proposal for the project was approved.
His proposal was met with a joyful yes.
The proposal outlined the business strategy.
The committee reviewed the new proposal.
Her proposal sparked a lively discussion.

back_cards.definition_en: A change in position or direction
back_cards.example_en: The shift in policy surprised everyone.
She worked the night shift at the hospital.
A shift in the wind cooled the air.
The morning shift arrived at 7 a.m.
The shift in attitude improved teamwork.

back_cards.definition_en: The ability to hold or contain
back_cards.example_en: The tank has a capacity of 50 gallons.
She has the capacity to learn quickly.
The factory operated at full capacity.
He acted in his capacity as manager.
The city has the capacity for growth.

example_en.example_en: The jury found him guilty of theft.
She felt guilty for forgetting the event.
The company was guilty of negligence.
His guilty expression gave him away.
They were guilty of breaking the rules.

back_cards.example_en: She warned him about the icy path.
The sign warned against swimming.
He warned her about the delay.
The teacher warned the class about the test.
They warned against hasty decisions.
His weak voice was hard to hear.
The weak bridge swayed in the wind.
Her argument was weak and unconvincing.
He felt weak after the illness.
The team’s defense was weak.
She attended a Catholic school.
The Catholic Mass was held on Sunday.
The Catholic community celebrated Easter.
The term has a catholic meaning in literature.
The Catholic cathedral was stunning.
Her nose itched from the cold air.
The nose of the plane dipped slightly.
His nose detected the scent of flowers.
She poked her nose into the mystery.
He won the race by a nose.
The weather was a variable in the experiment.
The variable x was solved for.
Time was a key variable in the study.
She defined a variable in the code.
Cost was an unpredictable variable.
The convention attracted industry leaders.
It’s a convention to shake hands.
The convention banned chemical weapons.
The novel broke literary conventions.

back_cards.definition_en: A gathering for a shared interest
back_cards.example_en: The comic convention was packed.

back_cards.definition_en: A group deciding a court case
back_cards.example_en: The jury deliberated for hours.
The jury awarded her first prize.
The jury was selected carefully.
The jury listened to the testimony.
The jury’s verdict was unanimous.

back_cards.definition_en: The underground part of a plant
back_cards.example_en: The tree’s root was deep.
The root of the problem was clear.
Her values were the root of her success.
The word’s root was Latin.
The square root of nine is three.
The incident caused a traffic jam.
The teacher handled the classroom incident.
The police investigated the incident.
The incident was reported in the news.
The incident surprised everyone.
She climbed the mountain with ease.
The plane climbed to 30,000 feet.
Prices climbed during the shortage.
The cat climbed the tree.
He climbed the ranks at work.
Her hearing was sharp despite her age.
The hearing was scheduled for Monday.
The council gave her a fair hearing.
The hearing of the speech inspired her.
The hearing addressed the complaint.
